activities:
Customers purchase and/or download software products, white papers, or other web materials.  Transfer of customer data to the United States for the purposes of marketing, facilitating transactions, customer support and storing customer data.  Generally, we ask only the minimally required personal data to complete the transaction.
When providing technical or customer support services, FileMaker may receive and process personal information controlled by a customer about their customers and processed at the direction of that customer.
